alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hi Smita,

I wanted to followup and see if you are still interested in taking a class at The Iron Yard. We have set our demo day for March 27th.  We would love to have you come out and join us!  Here is more information - https://ti.to/tiyhouston/demoday0327/

Also, it is not too late to apply for the program.  We are still interviewing students but classes are filling up, so the sooner the better. Apply here - http://theironyard.com/apply/

As always, feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns I can address.

Thanks,
alfredsnippet.name: March Demo Day Email
